## BigNumber.isNegative() method

Returns `true` if the value of this BigNumber is negative, otherwise returns `false`<!-- -->.

```ts
x = new BigNumber(-0)
x.isNegative()                  // true
y = new BigNumber(2)
y.isNegative()                  // false
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
isNegative(): boolean;
```
**Returns:**

boolean
